# Source files
set( SOURCES
	rf.cpp
)


# Header files
set( HEADERS
)

# Include the headers which are generated by uic and moc
# and include additional header
include_directories(
	../Base
	../GEO
	../FileIO
	../MSH
	../FEM
	../OGSProject

	${Shapelib_INCLUDE_DIR}	
)


# Create the library
add_executable( ogs
	${SOURCES}
	${HEADERS}
)

target_link_libraries( ogs
	Base
	GEO
	MSH
	FEM
	OGSProject
)
